content.question: Which of the following describes the purpose of the last sentence of the passage?

choices.label: It connects the author’s imagined scenario to his claim about the Athenians.
It helps the audience imagine what an artistic golden age might look like.
It provides some historical context for the writer’s religious references.
It establishes the author’s credentials by displaying his knowledge of ancient Athenian history.

content.answer: It connects the author’s imagined scenario to his claim about the Athenians.

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Identify and describe components of the rhetorical situation - the exigence, audience, purpose, context, and message.
